targets.expr: quantile(0.67, velor_consensus_current_epoch_validators{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"})

quantile(0.67, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name)(velor_connections{network_id="Validator", role_type="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"})) + 1

quantile(0.67, velor_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"}) / 100000000

targets.rawSql:
with supply_per_epoch as (
select epoch, FLOOR(supply/1e8) total_supply, sum(voting_power/1e8) total_staking
from (
  select transaction_epoch, supply
  from `indexer_mainnet_gcp.coin_supply` 
  QUALIFY ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY transaction_epoch ORDER BY transaction_version DESC) = 1
) a
join `indexer_mainnet_gcp.epoch_validators` b
on a.transaction_epoch = b.epoch
group by 1,2 order by 1),

max_epoch as (select max(epoch) as epoch from supply_per_epoch)

select total_supply from supply_per_epoch a join max_epoch b on a.epoch = b.epoch

targets.expr: avg(irate(velor_consensus_last_committed_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
max_over_time(irate(velor_consensus_last_committed_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[30s])[$__range:30s])

rate(velor_vm_txn_gas_usage_sum{kubernetes_pod_name=~".*", role=~"validator", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1h]) / rate(velor_vm_txn_gas_usage_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~".*", role=~"validator"}[1h])
quantile(0.67, velor_consensus_epoch{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"})

targets.rawSql: select entry_function_id_str, count(1) from `indexer_mainnet_gcp.user_transactions` group by 1 order by 2 desc LIMIT 10

targets.expr: (delta(velor_consensus_last_committed_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1d]) /  delta(velor_consensus_last_committed_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1d]) offset 1d) - 1

targets.rawSql:
select
  ds, count(*) as count
from
  (
    select
      *,
      DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles") as ds
    from
      `indexer_mainnet_gcp.user_transactions`
  )
group by
  1
order by
  1 desc
limit
  10

panels.description: Almost accurate number of running public full nodes.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(DISTINCT peer_id) as unique_connected_pfns 
FROM `analytics-test-345723.velor_node_telemetry.custom_events` 
WHERE $__timeFilter(event_timestamp) and (role_type in ("Unknown", "PublicFullNode","UnknownFullNode"))
and if(chain_id='1','mainnet',if(chain_id='2','testnet',null)) = "$chain_name";

panels.title: Connected PFNs*

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, velor_storage_latest_transaction_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"})

quantile(0.5, velor_chain_health_participating_voting_power_last_100_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator"}/velor_chain_health_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator"})*100

min(quantile(0.5, velor_chain_health_participating_num_validators_last_100_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator"}/velor_chain_health_total_num_validators{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator"})*100, 100)

count(quantile by (peer_id) (0.5, velor_consensus_participation_status{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",  role=~"validator"}) == 0) OR on() vector(0)

quantile by (peer_id) (0.5, velor_consensus_participation_status{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"}) == 0

count(clamp_min(velor_data_client_highest_advertised_data{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", data_type="transactions", run_uuid=~".*"} - on(kubernetes_pod_name,role, run_uuid) velor_state_sync_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", type="synced", run_uuid=~".*"}, 0) > 10000) OR on() vector(0)

sort_desc(clamp_min(velor_data_client_highest_advertised_data{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", data_type="transactions", run_uuid=~".*"} - on(kubernetes_pod_name,role, run_uuid) velor_state_sync_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", type="synced", run_uuid=~".*"}, 0) > 10000 )

avg(velor_all_validators_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"}) by (peer_id) * 100

avg(velor_all_validators_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"}) by (peer_id) * 100 / avg(velor_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"})

count(node_release_git_hash{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"}) by (git_hash, role)

avg(node_hostname{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"}) by (kubernetes_pod_name, name)

avg(velor_all_validators_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"}) by (peer_id) * 100 / avg(velor_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"})

label_del(node_release_git_hash{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"}, "chain_name", "cluster", "metrics_source", "namespace", "__name__", "role")

quantile(0.67, rate(velor_consensus_last_committed_round{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",role="validator"}[1m]))

quantile(0.67, rate(velor_consensus_last_committed_version{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"validator"}[$__rate_interval]) - 2 * rate(velor_consensus_last_committed_round{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"validator"}[$__rate_interval]))

quantile(0.67, velor_chain_health_participating_voting_power_last_100_rounds{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"validator"} * 100/velor_chain_health_total_voting_power{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"validator"})

quantile(0.67, velor_chain_health_participating_num_validators_last_100_rounds{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"validator"} * 100/velor_chain_health_total_num_validators{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"validator"})

sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, cluster)(velor_connections{network_id="Validator", role_type="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"})

velor_state_sync_version{type="synced", role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}

count(velor_data_client_highest_advertised_data{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", data_type="transactions"}  - on(kubernetes_pod_name,role, run_uuid) velor_state_sync_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"telemetry-service",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", type="synced"} > 10000)  OR on() vector(0)

count((node_process_run_time{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"}  - node_process_run_time{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"} offset 5m) < 0 ) or on() vector(0)

sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, network_id)(velor_connections{role="validator_fullnode", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"})

panels.description: Number of upstream validator peers a full node can proxy transactions up to

panels.title: Fullnode Upstream Peers

targets.expr: count(velor_data_client_highest_advertised_data{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",  role="validator_fullnode", data_type="transactions"}  - on(kubernetes_pod_name,role,run_uuid) velor_state_sync_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"telemetry-service", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator_fullnode", type="synced"} > 50000)  OR on() vector(0)

velor_state_sync_version{type="synced", role="validator_fullnode", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}

sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, network_id)(velor_connections{role="public_fullnode", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"})

panels.description: Number of upstream validator peers a full node can proxy transactions up to

targets.expr: velor_mempool_active_upstream_peers_count{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role="public_fullnode"}

panels.title: Fullnode Upstream Peers

targets.expr: count(velor_data_client_highest_advertised_data{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",  role="public_fullnode", data_type="transactions"}  - on(kubernetes_pod_name,role) velor_state_sync_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"telemetry-service", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="public_fullnode", type="synced"} > 50000)  OR on() vector(0)

velor_state_sync_version{type="synced", role="public_fullnode", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}

panels.description: Proposal failure rate in leader election window. Value goes back to 0 once node is not asked to propose at all in the window

targets.expr: velor_failed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"}

panels.title: Proposal failure count (in window)

panels.description: Participating in consensus in leader election window (either voted in last num_validators rounds, or proposed in last 10*num_validators rounds)

targets.expr: clamp_max(velor_committed_votes_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"} + velor_committed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"}, 1)

panels.title: Participating in consensus

panels.description: The error rate of main loop.

targets.expr: rate(velor_consensus_error_count{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1m]) / on (kubernetes_pod_name) rate(consensus_duration_count{op='main_loop', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1m])

panels.title: Error Rate

targets.expr: rate(velor_consensus_timeout_rounds_count{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1m])
velor_consensus_current_round{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}

velor_core_mempool_index_size{index="system_ttl", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}

quantile(0.5, rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", scope="e2e"}[1m])/rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", scope="e2e"}[1m]))

quantile(0.9, rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", scope="e2e"}[1m])/rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", scope="e2e"}[1m]))

quantile(0.99, rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", scope="e2e"}[1m])/rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", scope="e2e"}[1m]))

quantile(0.5, rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", submitted_by="peer_validator"}[1m])/rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", submitted_by="peer_validator"}[1m]))

quantile(0.9, rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", submitted_by="peer_validator"}[1m])/rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", submitted_by="peer_validator"}[1m]))

quantile(0.99, rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", submitted_by="peer_validator"}[1m])/rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", submitted_by="peer_validator"}[1m]))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(velor_executor_execute_block_seconds_bucket{role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1m])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(velor_executor_execute_block_seconds_bucket{role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1m])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.85, sum(rate(velor_executor_execute_block_seconds_bucket{role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1m])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.67, sum(rate(velor_executor_execute_block_seconds_bucket{role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1m])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(velor_executor_execute_block_seconds_bucket{role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1m])) by (le))

panels.description: This includes the API call time for submit_transaction

targets.expr:
sum( rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"pfn.*", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source="vmagent", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1m]) )/ sum (rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"pfn.*", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source="vmagent", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1m])) + 
sum (rate(velor_api_requests_sum{operation_id=~"submit_transaction", kubernetes_pod_name=~"pfn.*", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source="vmagent", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1m])) / sum(rate(velor_api_requests_count{operation_id=~"submit_transaction", kubernetes_pod_name=~"pfn.*", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source="vmagent", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1m]))

panels.title: Velor PFN-only e2e latency, including submit API time

panels.description: Data on PFN nodes only. Unless clients send duplicate transactions, this is a reliable way to see E2E latency.

targets.expr: sum (rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"pfn.*", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source="vmagent", namespace=~"$namespace", submitted_by="client"}[1m]))/sum(rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"pfn.*", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source="vmagent", namespace=~"$namespace", submitted_by="client"}[1m]))

quantile(0.5, rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"pfn.*", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source="vmagent", namespace=~"$namespace", submitted_by="client"}[1m])/rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"pfn.*", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source="vmagent", namespace=~"$namespace", submitted_by="client"}[1m]))

quantile(0.9, rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"pfn.*", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source="vmagent", namespace=~"$namespace", submitted_by="client"}[1m])/rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"pfn.*", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source="vmagent", namespace=~"$namespace", submitted_by="client"}[1m]))

quantile(0.99, rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"pfn.*", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source="vmagent", namespace=~"$namespace", submitted_by="client"}[1m])/rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"pfn.*", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source="vmagent", namespace=~"$namespace", submitted_by="client"}[1m]))

panels.title: (deprecated) Velor PFN-only e2e latency

panels.description: The storage synchronizer throughput (versions per second).

targets.expr: rate(velor_state_sync_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator",type="synced"}[2m])

panels.title: Validator Syncing throughput

panels.description: The difference between the highest advertised version and the currently synced version.

targets.expr: clamp_min(velor_data_client_highest_advertised_data{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", data_type="transactions"} - on(kubernetes_pod_name,role, run_uuid) velor_state_sync_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", type="synced"}, 0)

panels.title: Validator Sync lag (behind highest known)

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name) (rate(node_linux_system_cpu_usage{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state=~"idle_ms|iowait_ms"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (kubernetes_pod_name) (rate(node_linux_system_cpu_usage{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role="validator" , kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state!="context_switches"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (kubernetes_pod_name) (rate(node_linux_system_cpu_usage{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role="validator" , kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state=~"guest_ms|guest_nice_ms"}[$__rate_interval]))
node_process_memory{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}

node_disk_total_space{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"} - node_disk_available_space{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}

rate(node_linux_disk_num_reads{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(node_linux_disk_num_writes{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$__rate_interval])

rate(node_network_total_received{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(node_network_total_transmitted{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$__rate_interval])

irate(node_linux_system_cpu_usage{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", role=~"validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state="iowait_ms"}[1m]) / 1000

panels.title: Validator CPU time waiting for IO

targets.expr:
(count(node_release_git_hash{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",
kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"}) by (kubernetes_pod_name)) > 1
